## Quarto

### Rendering

-   [typst](https://quarto.org/docs/output-formats/typst.html) for PDF creation with exact look of HTML. 

### Extensions

-   [Quarto live](https://github.com/r-wasm/quarto-live) for interactive documents and code exercises to create educational content.

### Tips and tricks working with quarto

-   Use `quarto preview` in terminal to open a tab that will update live when making changes to files.
    -   Configure which file changes should trigger a re-rendering by using fx. `preview: watch: - "*.qmd"` in the `_quarto.yml` file.
